name: team_profile_delete
desc: Team profile fields have been deleted.
long_desc: My Slack API Getting started Slack apps Messages Integrations APIs Authentication Keep in touch Helpful resources Compatibility: RTM   The team_profile_delete event is sent to all connections for a team when a Team Admin deletes field definitions from the team profile. Only the ids of the deleted field definitions are included in the payload. Where appropriate, clients should update to reflect new changes immediately.
